rows.label: qst200708_msg0002
rows.name:
You've bested me once, but
don't get cocky just yet!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0003
rows.name: The burgle-off is far from over!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0004
rows.name:
Nobody said anything about
multiple rounds...

rows.label: qst200708_msg0005
rows.name:
The next item to steal is... Ready?
The Emperor Nefer's unmentionables!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0006
rows.name:
Uh, what?!
You want us to steal underwear?

rows.label: qst200708_msg0008
rows.name: Theft like that do nobody any good...

rows.label: qst200708_msg0009
rows.name: Do not think of it as a simple garment!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0010
rows.name:
Though at first glance the task
may seem frivolous...

rows.label: qst200708_msg0011
rows.name:
If you were to get caught, you'd be
facing a lifetime in prison...or even
death! The stakes are high, friends!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0012
rows.name:
Are you prepared to accept this
jeopardous challenge?!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0013
rows.name:
Mmm, I love jeopardous.
Jeopardous is my favorite flavor!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0015
rows.name: Tora not sure Idaten mean it that way.

rows.label: qst200708_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, well, well!
Round two of the burgle-off begins!

rows.label: qst200708_msg0017
rows.name:
After thieving Emperor Nefer's
underpants, we meet in Nharil
Central Plaza!
